column4: i am logged in as a regular user, what do i type in terminal to become admin(not root)? so i can apt-get update
'sudo apt-get update' 'sudo apt-get upgrade'    Your differeance between admin and root is.. err.. not correct
there is no root password..  the initial user has 'sudo' rights.. and yes it will want their password.
I guess you could call the 'first' user you made the admin account.. but its rarely called that..
